Giy Nike th thao chnh hng

Giy Nike Nam N Chnh Hng - u i Gim Gi ti 40%

Thng hiu giy Nike s hu nhng i sneaker ni ting hng u trn th gii. D mi nm u c rt nhiu sn phm mi ra mt vi mu m phong ph nhng i vi sneakerhead, Nike vn lun chim gi mt v tr quan trng khng th thay th. Trong bi vit sau y chng ti s cng bn tm hiu v thng hiu ny v nhng sn phm giy th thao Nike nam n chnh hng ang c mt ti Supersports.

1. Gii thiu v giy th thao Nike

Nike l mt tp on a quc gia ca M tham gia thit k, pht trin, sn xut, tip th v bn giy dp, qun o, thit b, ph kin v dch v trn ton th gii. Bn c th d dng bt gp giy Nike sneaker bt k u trong cuc sng hng ngy. Cc sn phm ca thng hiu c bit n rng ri nh vo nhng chin dch qung b ln vi quy m ton cu. Tuy nhin s ni ting ny khng ch nm qung co m chnh cht lng sn phm v mu m a dng ca nhng i giy nike th thao mi l th gi chn khch hng li bao nm qua.

Nhng chin dch qung co ca giy Nike cao cp lun c bit n rng ri.

Nhng i giy Nike th thao u tin c William thit k v ra mt vo nm 1972. Ngay lp tc giy Nike ly c thnh cng vang di nh bt kp xu hng am m chy b ca ngi M lc by gi. Thng hiu pht trin khng ngng nhng b chng li vo thp nin 80. Nike b nghi ng rng t trng tm qu nhiu vo vic qung b m khng ch n cht lng sn phm. Tuy nhin sau nhn hng lin tc cho ra mt nhng sn phm a dng v ng dng cng ngh giy mi p ng c nhu cu v thi trang v hiu nng s dng ca khch hng cng nh ph hp vi mc gi Nike chnh hng. Nike hon ton chng minh c rng s thnh cng ca thng hiu n t nhng sng to v lm vic khng ngng ngh nh khu hiu Just Do It.  

2. Cc dng giy th thao Nike nam n chnh hng ti Supersports

2.1. Nike Air Zoom

Giy Nike Air Zoom tip tc to ra s n hi, m i ti u trong tng bc chn. Tng t nh phin bn tin nhim, Nike Air Zoom s dng lp m phn ng gip bn si bc bn b chinh phc mi c ly.

Nike Air Zoom l dng giy luyn tp bn b

Mua ngay giy nike chnh hng mu mi nht p dng cng ngh tin tin gip bn t tin si bc

im c trng ca i giy Sneaker Nike Air Zoom
  • Phn thn trc c thit k rng hn mang li nhiu khng gian hn cho cc ngn chn, to cm gic va vn v thoi mi.
  • Cng ngh Zoom Air to ny mang li s m i cho mi bc chn.
  • Lp vi lt gia bn chn to cm gic va kht khi bn tht cht cc dy buc.

Mua giy Nike chnh hng vit nam ti Supersports

2.2. Nike Air Jordan

y l i giy m u cho vn ha sneakerhead

Giy Nike Air Jordan l mt trong nhng thnh tu ln nht ca Nike khi n l sn phm c thit k ring cho huyn thoi bng r Michael Jordan. i giy khai sinh vn ha sneakerhead (nhng k cung giy) khi gii tr M in cung hm m Jordan v sn lng mu giy ny.

Nike Air Jordan mi mi l huyn thoi gn lin vi tn tui cu th Michael Jordan.

c trng ca nhng i giy th thao Nike Jordan:
  • i giy vn tha k cng ngh Air ni bt ca Nike gip tng ny v kh nng tip t m i.
  • Cc m gt, mt c chn bo v bn chn tt hn khi nhng chn thng khi vn ng.
  • Phn upper lm bng da mm mi v lm tng cm gic m i, nh nhng cho chn.
  • cc phin bn sau, i Nike Air Jordan xut hin thm logo Jumpman trn li g v n tr thnh biu tng tiu biu cho dng giy Jordan.

Nike Air Jordan l mu giy ang c yu thch nht.

2.3. Nike Air Force

Nike Air Force l i giy bng r u tin a tn tui ca Nike bc ra th gii.

y l mu giy ni ting ca Nike c ra mt u tin vo nm 1982. i giy Nike nam ny nhanh chng ph bin nh cc cuc thi u bng r v tr thnh i sneaker c a chung nht lc by gi. Ci tn Air Force ly cm hng t chic my bay chuyn ch tng thng M Air Force One.

Mua ngay giy Nike chnh hng nam c cng ngh Air gip chn bn tip t nh nhng hn.

c trng ca i giy th thao Nike Air Force 1:
  • Thit k ti kh (Air) gt chn gip tip t mm mi hn v gim chn thng hiu qu.
  • Phn quai eo c chn ca Nike Force to im nhn ring ht sc thanh lch v thi trang.
  • Phn giy Nike chnh hng mu trng to hn thn giy tng bm mt t v h tr di chuyn linh hot.
  • Phn dy tht ca giy n gin, gip bn d dng iu chnh sao cho giy va vn vi chn.

2.4 Nike Blazer

Giy Nike Blazer l mt trong nhng mu giy th thao thi trang c a chung nht ca nh Nike. Vi thit k du Swoosh qu c t trng, mu giy ny lun c gii tr sn v yu thch. Nike Blazer c ba phin bn giy l Mid, High v Low c tnh, phong cch, ph hp vi mi trang phc. Giy Nike Blazer, mt dng giy th thao ph bin, thc cht l mu giy bng r c in ca Nike, mc d nhiu ngi cha bit rng n l mt trong nhng mu giy bng r lu i nht ca thng hiu ny. Nike Blazer ra mt ln u vo nm 1972 v ly cm hng t tn ca i bng r qu nh ca ngi sng lp nn Nike, i "Portland Trail Blazers". Thit k ca giy th hin s kt hp gia v p c in v tnh nng th thao hin i.

2.5 Nike Air Max

Nhc n Nike th khng th no b qua mu giy Nike Air Max vi thit k c in, l biu tng ca thi trang ng ph mt thi. Mu giy ny c thit k vo nm 1987, y l ln u tin mt i giy c phn m kh trong sut c gii thiu n th gii. Nike Air Max tr thnh biu tng ton cu trong lnh vc giy th thao nh thit k v cng c o ny. tng ny to nn mt cuc cch mng v nhanh chng, Nike Air Max chim c s a chung trn th trng nh v ngoi khng th nhm vo u ca n. n ngy nay, giy Nike Air Max tr thnh dng sn phm giy bn chy nht v c yu thch ht mc trong tt c cc thng hiu giy.

3. a ch mua giy Nike nam n chnh hng gi r u?

Giy Nike chnh hng gi bao nhiu tin? Gi ca mt i giy Nike ph thuc vo nhiu yu t nh loi giy, cht liu, kch c v v tr mua. Tuy nhin, gi trung bnh ca mt i giy Nike thng dao ng t khong $50 n $200 hoc cao hn nu l phin bn gii hn hoc c thit k c bit. Bn c th tham kho ngay trn trang Supersports. Ngoi ra sn phm ca mt thng hiu ni ting nh Nike ng nhin khng th trnh khi tnh trng b lm gi, lm nhi trn th trng. V vy v vn giy Nike chnh hng bao nhiu tin v a ch mua giy th thao Nike chnh hng u li cng l vn c nhiu ngi thc mc nht. Chnh v vy Supersports s l mt a ch ng tin cy khi bn mun mua giy Nike chnh hng Vit Nam.

Mua giy Nike Vit Nam chnh hng n ngay Supersport

Chng ti lun cam kt vi khch hng v cht lng sn phm cng nh cht lng dch v. Vi mong mun mang n s hi lng nht cho khch hng, bn hy n Supersports ngay tn hng mt tri nghim mua sm giy Nike chnh hng online tuyt vi nh.
